metadata.title: CVE-2018-10471 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds zero write and hypervisorcrash) via unexpected INT 80 processing, because of an incorrect fix forCVE-2017-5754.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenevtchn1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
